poll_info.title: NuggMD Cannabis Consumer Poll - Q4 2025 Omnibus
poll_info.methodology: Digital questionnaire sent to opt-in list of verified cannabis consumers via NuggMD.com first-party data

questions.question_text: When you encounter a cannabis brand that has a celebrity spokesperson, backer, or founder, how do you feel about that brand?
From what you can observe as a consumer, to what extent do you feel brands and retailers intentionally market cannabis to those under the age of 21?
If your health insurance covered the cost of cannabis recommended by a doctor, how do you believe that would affect the quality of the health care you receive?
Would you consider changing from a health insurance provider that does not cover any medical cannabis costs to one that does cover some?
REDACTED - This question is reserved for internal use.
REDACTED - This question is reserved for internal use.
REDACTED - This question is reserved for internal use.
The president recently signed legislation that re-criminalizes hemp-derived THC, which was made legal in 2018. Do you support or oppose this policy?
REDACTED - This question is reserved for internal use.
What is your level of interest in an app that uses real-world data on consumer preference, such as our opinion polling, to provide strain and product recommendations based on your desired effects?

demographics.population: Representative sample of cannabis consumers in state-legal markets
demographics.sample_method: Sourced from independent providers of verified consumer data and first-party data
demographics.verification: Regular cannabis users. A strong majority of the sample reports daily or weekly cannabis use.
